original_text: Gideon also warned the men of Peniel, ‘When I have won the fight against my enemies, I will return. Then I will destroy your strong tower.’
korean_text: 기드온이 또 브누엘 사람들에게 말하여 이르되 내가 평안히 돌아올 때에 이 망대를 헐리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: Gideon also warned the men of Peniel
'When I have won the fight against my enemies
Then I will destroy your strong tower'
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 나는 너희의 강한 망대를 파괴할 것입니다'
